thread.section_title: Hitchweb.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Hitchweb.com | hitchweb.com
thread.title: Dennis

author: Dennis
title: Dennis
text:
Had made an order for a Hitch Mount for my 2017 Subaru Forester this morning and suddenly remembered that I forgot to order a hitch cover for it. Sent them an email regarding this and received an email in the afternoon that they will add the cover to my order for free and will send all together tomorrow.
Also, their website is very user friendly.
Will definitely consider this company on my next purchase.
